long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please note: This is a paid product with a 10-minute free trial.

Maestra Realtime Transcription & Subtitling Extension

Transform your browsing experience with the Maestra Realtime Transcription & Subtitling Extension. This powerful tool seamlessly attaches to your Chrome tabs, capturing audio in real-time and providing accurate transcriptions and subtitles in 125+ languages on the go.

Key Features:

Realtime Transcription: Automatically transcribe audio from your browser tabs with high accuracy.
Subtitling: Get instant subtitles for audio content, enhancing accessibility and comprehension.
Session Management: Save and manage your transcriptions and subtitles effortlessly.
Integration with Maestra: At the end of each session, your files are securely saved to your Maestra account for easy access and further editing.
Whether you're attending an online meeting, watching a video, or listening to a podcast, the Maestra Realtime Transcription & Subtitling Extension ensures you never miss a word. Enhance your productivity and accessibility with Maestra today!
